.table mother
----

.table father
----

parent{child: C, parent: P} :-
  mother{child: C, mother: P} | father{child: C, father: P}.
----

grandparent{grandchild: A, grandparent: C} :-
  parent{child: A, parent: B} &
  parent{child: B, parent: C}.
----

grandfather{grandchild: A, grandfather: C} :-
  parent{child: A, parent: B} &
  father{child: B, father: C}.
----

grandmother{grandchild: A, grandmother: C} :-
  parent{child: A, parent: B} &
  mother{child: B, mother: C}.
----

father{child: "Mary", father: "Mark"}.
----
father: [father{child: "Mary", father: "Mark"}; {}]
2: [father{child: "Mary", father: "Mark"}; {C: "Mary", P: "Mark"}]
6: [father{child: "Mary", father: "Mark"}; {B: "Mary", C: "Mark"}]
0: [father{child: "Mary", father: "Mark"}; {C: "Mary", P: "Mark"}]
8: []
parent: [parent{child: "Mary", parent: "Mark"}; {C: "Mary", P: "Mark"}]
3: [parent{child: "Mary", parent: "Mark"}; {}]
4: [parent{child: "Mary", parent: "Mark"}; {A: "Mary", B: "Mark"}]
7: [parent{child: "Mary", parent: "Mark"}; {A: "Mary", B: "Mark"}]
10: [parent{child: "Mary", parent: "Mark"}; {A: "Mary", B: "Mark"}]
5: [parent{child: "Mary", parent: "Mark"}; {A: "Mary", B: "Mark"}]
5: [parent{child: "Mary", parent: "Mark"}; {A: "Mary", B: "Mark"}]
8: []
11: []
grandparent: [grandparent{grandchild: "Mary", grandparent: C}; {A: "Mary", B: "Mark"}]
grandparent: [grandparent{grandchild: "Mary", grandparent: C}; {A: "Mary", B: "Mark"}]

mother{child: "Pete", mother: "Mary"}.
----
mother: [mother{child: "Pete", mother: "Mary"}; {}]
1: [mother{child: "Pete", mother: "Mary"}; {C: "Pete", P: "Mary"}]
9: [mother{child: "Pete", mother: "Mary"}; {B: "Pete", C: "Mary"}]
0: [mother{child: "Pete", mother: "Mary"}; {C: "Pete", P: "Mary"}]
11: []
parent: [parent{child: "Pete", parent: "Mary"}; {C: "Pete", P: "Mary"}]
3: [parent{child: "Pete", parent: "Mary"}; {}]
4: [parent{child: "Pete", parent: "Mary"}; {A: "Pete", B: "Mary"}]
7: [parent{child: "Pete", parent: "Mary"}; {A: "Pete", B: "Mary"}]
10: [parent{child: "Pete", parent: "Mary"}; {A: "Pete", B: "Mary"}]
5: [parent{child: "Pete", parent: "Mary"}; {A: "Mary", B: "Mark"}, parent{child: "Pete", parent: "Mary"}; {A: "Pete", B: "Mary"}]
5: [parent{child: "Pete", parent: "Mary"}; {A: "Pete", B: "Mary"}, parent{child: "Pete", parent: "Mary"}; {A: "Pete", B: "Mary"}]
8: [parent{child: "Pete", parent: "Mary"}; {A: "Pete", B: "Mary", C: "Mark"}]
11: []
grandparent: [grandparent{grandchild: "Mary", grandparent: C}; {A: "Mary", B: "Mark"}]
grandparent: [grandparent{grandchild: "Pete", grandparent: C}; {A: "Pete", B: "Mary"}]
grandparent: [grandparent{grandchild: "Pete", grandparent: C}; {A: "Pete", B: "Mary"}]
grandparent: [grandparent{grandchild: "Pete", grandparent: C}; {A: "Pete", B: "Mary"}]
grandfather: [grandfather{grandchild: "Pete", grandfather: "Mark"}; {A: "Pete", B: "Mary", C: "Mark"}]
